OutlandGenes.XenoReproductionGeneTemplat.label: {0} reproduction
OutlandGenes.XenoReproductionGeneTemplat.description: Carriers of this gene either through egg laying or birth, specifically produce a {0} xenotype baby.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If multiple of this type of gene are on a single pawn, it will choose one at random each time.
Might not affect forms of reproduction added by other mods.
Only takes effect if on the pawn giving birth.
